issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{{euca-bundle-vol}} gives the following error with the {{euca2ools 3.0.1 (Sparta)}} release,
{noformat}
[root@euca-1-114-227-106 ~]# euca-bundle-vol -p my-new-img -d /root/bundletest/ -e /var/lib/dhclient -s 2048 --generate-fstab --no-inherit --kernel eki-36C33740 --ramdisk eri-528E35BC -r x86_64 --debug
2013-09-09 08:19:26,812 DEBUG   BundleVol parsed arguments: {'generate_fstab': True, 'kernel': 'eki-36C33740', 'show_progress': True, 'fstab': None, 'part_size': 10485760, 'prefix': 'my-new-img', 'ec2cert': None, 'exclude': ['/var/lib/dhclient'], 'size': 2048, 'productcodes': [], 'bundle_all_dirs': False, 'destination': '/root/bundletest/', 'include': None, 'ramdisk': 'eri-528E35BC', 'volume': '/', 'user': None, 'arch': 'x86_64', 'block_device_mappings': None, 'userregion': None, 'privatekey': None, 'batch': False, 'inherit': False, 'filter': True, 'cert': None}
2013-09-09 08:19:26,812 DEBUG   Config searching regions for option 'user'
2013-09-09 08:19:26,812 DEBUG   Config   section 'aws:us-east-1'
2013-09-09 08:19:26,812 DEBUG   Config   section 'aws:*'
2013-09-09 08:19:26,812 DEBUG   Config   section '*:us-east-1'
2013-09-09 08:19:26,812 DEBUG   Config   section '*:*'
2013-09-09 08:19:26,812 INFO    Config option 'user' not found
2013-09-09 08:19:26,812 DEBUG   Config searching regions for option 'certificate'
2013-09-09 08:19:26,812 DEBUG   Config   section 'aws:us-east-1'
2013-09-09 08:19:26,812 DEBUG   Config   section 'aws:*'
2013-09-09 08:19:26,812 INFO    Config option 'certificate' = '/usr/share/euca2ools/certs/cert-ec2.pem'
2013-09-09 08:19:26,812 DEBUG   BundleVol certificate: /root/euca2-admin-fd89f329-cert.pem
2013-09-09 08:19:26,812 DEBUG   BundleVol private key: /root/euca2-admin-fd89f329-pk.pem
2013-09-09 08:19:26,812 DEBUG   BundleVol cloud certificate: /root/cloud-cert.pem
2013-09-09 08:19:26,813 DEBUG   BundleVol account ID: 604650523622
Creating image...1+0 records in
1+0 records out
1048576 bytes (1.0 MB) copied, 0.00100268 s, 1.0 GB/s
 euca-bundle-vol: error: _make_filesystem() got an unexpected keyword argument 'type'
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/bin/euca-bundle-vol", line 6, in <module>
    euca2ools.commands.bundle.bundlevol.BundleVol.run()
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/command.py", line 289, in run
    cmd.handle_cli_exception(err)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/command.py", line 286, in run
    result = cmd.main()
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/euca2ools/commands/bundle/bundlevol.py", line 169, in main
    image_file = ImageCreator(log=self.log, **self.args).run()
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/euca2ools/commands/bundle/imagecreator.py", line 345, in run
    self._make_filesystem(**self.filesystem)
TypeError: _make_filesystem() got an unexpected keyword argument 'type'
{noformat}
fields.summary: euca-bundle-vol fails with "TypeError: _make_filesystem() got an unexpected keyword argument 'type'"

comments.body:
Downgrading euca2ools to {{3.0.0-0.20.el6}} works fine on the same instance.

{noformat}
[root@euca-1-114-227-106 ~]# euca-bundle-vol -p my-new-img -d /root/bundletest/ -e /var/lib/dhclient -s 2048 --generate-fstab --no-inherit --kernel eki-36C33740 --ramdisk eri-528E35BC -r x86_64 --debug

{noformat}

Possible commit that might have broke imagecreator.py,
https://github.com/eucalyptus/euca2ools/commit/0955966ab1599cae4d2745363f1a5a1dd9c24d44

{code:title=imagecreator.py|borderStyle=solid}
 38 NO_EXCLUDE_ENVAR = 'EUCA_BUNDLE_VOL_EMPTY_EXCLUDES'
 39 BLKID_TAGS = ('LABEL', 'TYPE', 'UUID')
 40 ALLOWED_FS_TYPES = ('ext2', 'ext3', 'ext4', 'xfs', 'jfs', 'reiserfs')
{code}

We don't change the {{TYPE}} to {{FSTYPE}} in {{BLKID_TAGS}}.
This should be fixed by {{ed969af}} in the {{3.0-maint}} branch.

Fixed.

{noformat}
[root@localhost ~]# euca-version
euca2ools 3.0.1-5-ged969af (Sparta)
{noformat}

{noformat}
[root@localhost ~]# euca-bundle-vol -p my-new-img -d /root/bundletest/ -e /var/lib/dhclient -s 2048 --generate-fstab --no-inherit --kernel eki-36C33740 --ramdisk eri-528E35BC -r x86_64 --debug
